tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_survey_responses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_id INT,
  concert_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_responses (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_id INT,
  concert_id INT,
  feedback TEXT);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_id INT,
  concert_id INT,
  survey_question TEXT,
  survey_answer TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Survey_Responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT,
    survey_question VARCHAR(255),
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Concert_Details (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(255),
    concert_date DATE,
    venue_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_attendees INT
);

CREATE TABLE concert_attendees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(50),
    venue_name VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT,
    concert_id INT,
    satisfaction_level INT,
    comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE questions (
    question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question_text TEXT,
    question_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT,
    concert_id INT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES concert_attendees(attendee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (concert_id) REFERENCES concerts(concert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_ratings (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_type VARCHAR,
    rating INT,
    feedback_comments TEXT,
    attendee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES concert_attendees(attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_date DATE,
    survey_questions TEXT,
    attendee_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES concert_attendees(attendee_id)
);
